testsuite.name: bigfight.combat.CombatEachSkillTest
testsuite.system-out: null roar in anger, as if the king of beasts to scare the enemy away. null quivers and lose HP 15 (HP 85 remains). null's body light as a swallow, running towards the opponent in quick step and attack with cannon fist. null covers his wound in pain, losing HP 10 (HP -8 remains). The opponent falls smoothly, breathe stopped, in apparent death
